### getPassName() {#aae846e8c4a9592060adeecb70e46919e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="StringRef llvm::HexagonMask::getPassName () const"
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
getPassName - Return a nice clean name for a pass.

This usually implemented in terms of the name that is registered by one of the Registration templates, but can be overloaded directly.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonmask-cpp/#l00037">37</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonmask-cpp">HexagonMask.cpp</a>.
